title: 240A-German Fairy Tales: Man of Glass
itunes:title: 240A-German Fairy Tales: Man of Glass
description:
A German fairy tale about striving, falling short, and then seeking help from dangerous mythological creatures to help you pick up the slack.

The creature is Azrail, the giant who is terrible at fighting.

--
